channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Minneapolis Catholic schoolchildren listened to a prayer, then ducked for cover from gunfire
item.description: The pews of a Minneapolis church were packed with teachers, parents and schoolchildren paired with older ‘buddies’ listening to a prayer on their third day of the new school year.

item.title: Hundreds honor 2 children killed and 17 people wounded in shooting at a Minneapolis Catholic school
Guard not needed in Chicago, Pritzker tells AP during tour of city to counter Trump’s crime claims
